verbs.description: While Donald Trump 's first year as president [V: has] been pretty good overall for job creation , Americans nevertheless saw the slowest job growth in six years .

While [ARG1: Donald Trump 's first year as president] has [V: been] [ARG2: pretty good] [ARGM-ADV: overall] [ARGM-PNC: for job creation] , Americans nevertheless saw the slowest job growth in six years .

[ARGM-ADV: While Donald Trump 's first year as president has been pretty good overall for job creation] , [ARG0: Americans] [ARGM-DIS: nevertheless] [V: saw] [ARG1: the slowest job growth in six years] .
